Entries.default:
"Hold it right there, mate."

The pirate stares you down, hand clutching the hilt of his sword. His arm is roped with muscle and striated with pale scars.

"Ah, aye. 'Bout time you got here. The elf's been chewing her thumbs to nubs waiting for you."

He sheathes the cutlass with a grunt.

"Port's closed to outsiders. So I'll be seeing you off now - into Ondra's embrace."

With an audible crack of his neck, he lunges for you, cutlass swiping.
Hand raking through his damp brown hair, he studies you sharply, maybe still debating if he should cut you in two.
"Cut him down to the deck!"
"I'm looking for Gwenfin, Dereo's associate."
"Who controls this territory?"
"Farewell."
The pirate jerks his chin toward the edge of the bay.
"There. 'Cross the water. Little bird's flittering in the old ruins. Hurry on, else she comes to squawk at us."
He cants you a suspicious gaze.
"State your business. I mean it. Spill your guts or spill your blood."
[Show the suolenet.]

"Pah. If you've got a suolenet, be showing it sooner. Blasted inflow of bodies is so swelled, I can't keep up. Go on then, get to your business."

He rasps a breath from between his teeth, exasperated.
[Lie] "I came to see your captain."

"If you've come to see Mad Morena, gods shield your soul."

He swipes the cutlass to point at the squat fort along the eastern lip of the cavern.
"Far be it from me to be stopping your march into death. Captain's there. And she's in a fit of a mood. So step lightly, aye?"
"I came to see your captain about the Roparu."
"If you can't spot a Pr√≠ncipi port for what it is, I might get to thinking you're not supposed to be here."

"If you've come to see Mad Morena, gods shield your soul."

He swipes the cutlass to point at the squat fort along the eastern lip of the cavern.
[Attack] "Only your blood will soak this ground today."
[Leave] "I seem to have taken a wrong turn."
"As wrong as it gets. So wrong, it's your last."
"You've got some gall, I'll give you that."
"You back to see the boss?"
"Yes, and you know how she hates to be kept waiting."
"I'm here on other business."
"I'll be escortin' you, then. Stick close now."
"Then you best be careful to mind your own."
"I'm here on behalf of Captain Aeldys."
He cants you a suspicious gaze.
